name: Business Magnate
description: Business Magnate is a tycoon business simulation game where you can create all types of businesses: Cars, rockets, phones, tanks, trucks, airplanes, computers, and ships. Design, produce, market and sell them. You can even run multiple companies at the same time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz dual core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware accelerated graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 120 MB available space Additional Notes: minimum resolution of 800x600
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware accelerated graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 120 MB available space Additional Notes: you'll see more details at a resolution of at least 1680 x 1050
